description: Describes all available options for the specified engine.

parameters.name: EngineName
parameters.description: The name of the engine to describe options for. Valid Values: db2-ae db2-se mariadb mysql oracle-ee oracle-ee-cdb oracle-se2 oracle-se2-cdb postgres sqlserver-ee sqlserver-se sqlserver-ex sqlserver-web.

parameters.name: Filters
parameters.description: This parameter isn't currently supported. (dict) --- A filter name and value pair that is used to return a more specific list of results from a describe operation. Filters can be used to match a set of resources by specific criteria, such as IDs. The filters supported by a describe operation are documented with the describe operation. The following actions can be filtered: DescribeDBClusterBacktracks DescribeDBClusterEndpoints DescribeDBClusters DescribeDBInstances DescribeDBRecommendations DescribeDBShardGroups DescribePendingMaintenanceActions The name of the filter. Filter names are case-sensitive. One or more filter values. Filter values are case-sensitive. (string) ---

parameters.name: MaxRecords
parameters.description: The maximum number of records to include in the response. If more records exist than the specified MaxRecords value, a pagination token called a marker is included in the response so that you can retrieve the remaining results. Default: 100 Constraints: Minimum 20, maximum 100.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupOptions
nested_items.description: List of available option group options.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the option.

nested_items.name: Description
nested_items.description: The description of the option.

nested_items.name: EngineName
nested_items.description: The name of the engine that this option can be applied to.

nested_items.name: MajorEngineVersion
nested_items.description: Indicates the major engine version that the option is available for.

nested_items.name: MinimumRequiredMinorEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum required engine version for the option to be applied.

nested_items.name: PortRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the option requires a port.

nested_items.name: DefaultPort
nested_items.description: If the option requires a port, specifies the default port for the option.

nested_items.name: OptionsDependedOn
nested_items.description: The options that are prerequisites for this option.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: OptionsConflictsWith
nested_items.description: The options that conflict with this option.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: Persistent
nested_items.description: Persistent options can't be removed from an option group while DB instances are associated with the option group. If you disassociate all DB instances from the option group, your can remove the persistent option from the option group.

nested_items.name: Permanent
nested_items.description: Permanent options can never be removed from an option group. An option group containing a permanent option can't be removed from a DB instance.

nested_items.name: RequiresAutoMinorEngineVersionUpgrade
nested_items.description: If true, you must enable the Auto Minor Version Upgrade setting for your DB instance before you can use this option. You can enable Auto Minor Version Upgrade when you first create your DB instance, or by modifying your DB instance later.

nested_items.name: VpcOnly
nested_items.description: If true, you can only use this option with a DB instance that is in a VPC.

nested_items.name: SupportsOptionVersionDowngrade
nested_items.description: If true, you can change the option to an earlier version of the option. This only applies to options that have different versions available.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupOptionSettings
nested_items.description: The option settings that are available (and the default value) for each option in an option group.

nested_items.name: SettingName
nested_items.description: The name of the option group option.

nested_items.name: SettingDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the option group option.

nested_items.name: DefaultValue
nested_items.description: The default value for the option group option.

nested_items.name: ApplyType
nested_items.description: The DB engine specific parameter type for the option group option.

nested_items.name: AllowedValues
nested_items.description: Indicates the acceptable values for the option group option.

nested_items.name: IsModifiable
nested_items.description: Indicates whether this option group option can be changed from the default value.

nested_items.name: IsRequired
nested_items.description: Indicates whether a value must be specified for this option setting of the option group option.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersionPerAllowedValue
nested_items.description: The minimum DB engine version required for the corresponding allowed value for this option setting.

nested_items.name: AllowedValue
nested_items.description: The allowed value for an option setting.

nested_items.name: MinimumEngineVersion
nested_items.description: The minimum DB engine version required for the allowed value.

nested_items.name: OptionGroupOptionVersions
nested_items.description: The versions that are available for the option.

nested_items.name: Version
nested_items.description: The version of the option.

nested_items.name: IsDefault
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the version is the default version of the option.

nested_items.name: CopyableCrossAccount
nested_items.description: Indicates whether the option can be copied across Amazon Web Services accounts.

nested_items.name: Marker
nested_items.description: An optional pagination token provided by a previous request. If this parameter is specified, the response includes only records beyond the marker, up to the value specified by MaxRecords.
